cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4657, Veteran Home Energy Savings Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 129 (Thursday, July 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LEVIN of California:
H.R. 4657.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H3846]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: Veteran Home Energy Savings Act
